source_caption_data.pre_caption:
This breathtaking night scene showcases the vibrant green aurora borealis illuminating a starry sky. A tall, snow-dusted evergreen tree stands prominently in the center of the frame, rising from a snowy landscape dotted with a forest of other pines.

This is a time-lapse video. The aurora and clouds can be seen moving across the sky.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption:
This breathtaking night scene showcases the vibrant green aurora borealis illuminating a starry sky. A tall, snow-dusted evergreen tree stands prominently in the center of the frame, rising from a snowy landscape dotted with a forest of other pines.

This is a time-lapse video. The aurora and clouds can be seen moving across the sky.

bad_caption: A flock of flamingos walks in a line across a sandy beach as gentle ocean waves roll in behind them. In the background, a group of dolphins leaps out of the water, moving from left to right. The flamingos pause briefly, then continue their march toward a cluster of palm trees at the edge of the shore.
